meta.name: description
meta.content: Gateway Lab School is a Delaware public charter school. Gateway Lab School serves students in grades 3 through 8 who struggle to achieve academic success in a traditional classroom environment.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Gateway, Gateway Lab School, Wilmington, Delaware, Charter School; Tutoring

li.a: Messages from the Head of School
Send An Email to the Head of School
Send An Email to the Principal

section.div: Where the Arts are the Gateway to Learning

div.div: The Gateway Lab School philosophy is based on the belief that children, who have struggled to achieve academic success in the traditional school environment and learn differently, have the capacity to achieve academic success and to realize individual learning potential.

The teachers and staff of Gateway Lab School are committed to developing a sense of inquiry and love of learning in each student. This is accomplished by focusing on providing interventions in the areas of reading, oral and written language, math and motor skills. The social studies and humanities areas of study provides a unique program that incorporates art, music, drama and hands-on learning experiences.
Our mission is to maximize each student’s academic ability and social growth through innovative arts-based learning in a safe and nurturing environment.
Gateway is an innovative school of excellence that prepares students for life.

div.div: Gateway Lab School Remote Instructional Plan - approved by Delaware Sec. of Education on 4/7/2020. (PDF Viewer required to read)

img.alt: Weekly Gateway Gladiator Gathering Featured Photo

div.div: Join us for an opportunity for our school community to come together every Wednesday at 12 pm via Zoom! See the attached flyer for details.

img.alt: Gateway Internet Technology Use Agreement & Internet Safety Policy Featured Photo

h3.a: Gateway Internet Technology Use Agreement & Internet Safety Policy

div.div: Every student and guardian signed the attached Internet Technology Use Agreement and Internet Safety Policy at the beginning of the school year. It is attached here for parents to review with their children as needed.

img.alt: Gladiator Gazette - March 2020 Edition Featured Photo

div.div: Take a look back at all of the fantastic events that took place at Gateway Lab School during the month of February - Black History Month, Artist-in-Residence Calypso Connections, Basketball and a visit from Secretary of Education - Ms. Susan Bunting!
Please read the following instructions to prepare for student online learning if the need arises.

img.alt: Gateway Pandemic Preparedness Plan Featured Photo

div.div:
Dear Gateway Lab School Community, Please review the attached Pandemic Preparedness Action Plan for information on the steps that the school is taking/will take as information is received about the status of the COVID-19 virus in our area. We will continue to update our families and staff about any changes as they occur.
Thank you, Gateway Administration

img.alt: Gateway Gladiator Gazette - February 2020 Edition Featured Photo

div.div: Gateway students, teachers and staff enjoyed all of the many exciting learning opportunities at school during the month of January. Take a look inside our latest edition for the full story.
